title: Being a Grandparent, DL Hughley, Sheryl Underwood, Carla's Reality Update and more.
itunes:title: Being a Grandparent, DL Hughley, Sheryl Underwood, Carla's Reality Update and more.
description:
Today is Thursday and show opens up as a confessional booth.  Uncle Steve makes an admission in regards to his grandchildren.  Another Original King of Comedy stops by the show.  We welcome D.L. Hughley.  Entertainment News contains more about Lori Laughlin and her role in this college admissions scandal.  Sheryl Underwood talks about fiber and has big news for us.  Miss Carla has some info on the Jussie Smollett hearing along with news about Empire, plus more.  Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog speaks about happiness and why you should not go looking for it where you lost it and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
